page.title: 13Sarn Show
page.content: Sarn Show is held at{Gwernygoe Meadow on the second Saturday in{August. Admission is Â£1 for Adults and 50p for children.The car park is free.At Sarn Show you have all kinds of races.You have some money if you are first, second or third.We have a dog show and we have go-cart racing.Your mum plays rounders and some boys play football.There is a knockout where you play all sorts of games,and some people from the garage go on a motor-bike. My mum is the secretary of Sarn Show.The secretary,the judges, the stewards and the chairman all wear badges.In the evening,there is a dance. I like Sarn Show because you can do all kinds of things like riding on a donkey,or watching the dog show.
